name: Daredab
product_desc:
Do you like Truth or Dare ?  Read on... you will love Daredab !!!

Daredab is a fun, exciting, unique social network connecting people around fun social dares and challenges created by themselves. 

To achieve this, Daredab only allows three types of publications :
 
1 - Dare (post)
That's a post a user makes to dare others to do something fun, exciting.
For example : Dare others to take a selfie with a total stranger without asking their permission.

2 - Dab (post)
That's a post a user makes to respond to a Dare, to prove that he has completed the dare successfully. 
For example : In response to the 'selfie with a stranger' Dare, post your own selfie with a stranger near you.

3 - Challenge (post)
When a Dare is interesting, generates enough dabs, Daredab sets a prize and an expiration date on it : that Dare becomes a Challenge. The Dab with the most votes wins the prize, the Challenge.
For example : selfie with a stranger challenge or selfie with a star challenge.
high_concept: Have fun, Challenge the world, and Win

name: Bottle
product_desc:
Bottle est l'application sociale qui permet d'offrir à manger ou à boire à ses amis en un simple clic. Bottle s'étend évidement à d'autres type de produits
Grace à un système de vouchers, Bottle informe le bénéficiaire par SMS afin de notifier de la disponibilité d'un gift.
le bénéficiaire ayant reçu le SMS bottle, se rend donc dans le point de consommation le plus proche de lui pour consommer sont gift.
les points de consommation potentiels sont:
- les bars /restaurants
- les fast-foods (kfc, mcdonalds etc...)
- les stations services
- les centres commerciaux
- les supérettes et les épiceries
- les commerces de tous genre
L'innovation de Bottle réside en ceci qu'il fait  du transfert de service. Et de plus, par la mutualisation de sa valeur ajoutée, Bottle permet aux propriétaires de commerces en tout genre de devenir des points de consommation potentiel des gifts Bottle.
Bottle rapproche des communautés virtuelles distantes autour d'action plus matérielles simple comme celle du Gift.

name: AMoney
product_desc: We use our multi-rail technology combining blockchain technology and diistributed ledger technology to enable cross-border payments. Our multi-rail technology as a next generation payment processing transmission system that is both decentralized and ultra-secure, has the ability to hold, transmit and transfer value from sender to receiver in seconds. A good analogy is how some mobile payments allow money transfers to happen over a protocol called Short Messaging Service, they transfer value via text and the end points are mobile phones. Our protocol is our multi-rail technology and our end points are bank accounts and mobile wallets. Through an innovative payments framework we provide the industry with a secure, compliant and simpler way of sending low value payments, cross-border commercial payments and inter-bank commercial payments  in any currency, realising greater competitive advantage for our customers: financial institutions, payment aggregators and money transfers companies.
high_concept: Multi-rail blockchain technology to enable real-time settlement cross-border payments
markets: Financial Services, Big Data, Mobile Payments, Finance Technology

name: Dovic Relief
product_desc:
At Dovic Relief Cameroon we belief that each human being has the rights to live an average life of meeting their needs easily, we also belief that poverty is a system and its courses are interlinked and some of these linkages are obvious. In order for lives to improve, the poor most come out of poverty and to do so they most have the tools to fight it across all fronts.
We therefore target areas that will help people have a change in their lives style.
- Empowering girls and women in rural areas
-Empowering youths in the rural areas
-Empowering the community
-Assisting the Elderly.
     We encourage Women and girls to engage in activities that will help improve their lives,keep them busy and happy.we form groups of five to ten wemen, educate them,provide them with resources for a startup activities or support them to continue thier previous activity in a better way. We do a continues follow up on project growth,management and audit.
high_concept: profit making entrepreneurial,innovative and developmental activities.

name: Ezan

name: MyAconnect
product_desc:
MyAconnect is a full-end Ecommerce technology solution .
MyAconnect enables and powers e-commerce in Africa as a one stop shop for merchants digital  and e-retail services including Fintech, Marketplace channel management, cross-border management, digital marketing technology solutions, warehousing and fulfillment, last-mile and on-demand delivery, localized customer service and more.
We Help Merchants, SMEs, SMBs, Brands & Retailers Sell Online with our full service ecommerce solutions in Africa. We provide them engaging marketplaces, provide payment solutions, assist with performance marketing, manage customer service, take care of inventory, customize order fulfillment, provide disruptive logistics intelligence, delivery data science, location and mapping solutions,  and deliver those orders efficiently to customers. Yes, we are a unique one-stop service provider to manage all these critical touchpoints of ecommerce in Africa.
high_concept: Google for African Ecommerce, powering ecommerce in Africa using the best technology.
markets: E-Commerce, Mobile Payments, Entertainment Industry, Same Day Delivery

name: Mecanergy
product_desc:
green bottle is the first product developed by the startup MECANERGY. This is a cylindrical battery that will be installed on demand on the back of cars and in the luggage compartment. This cylinder will then be connected to the alternator which is located in the engine block so as to recharge when the car engine is running.
The cylinder has an electronic module which allows the driver to follow its recharge level on his smartphone. The cylinder and recharged makes available an additional source of energy that can be connected to a secondary circuit in a home or building, and ensure the operation of low power devices.
The green bottle can thus enable them houseowner reduce their electricity bill by over 25%.
high_concept: convert mechanical action into green electricity
markets: Clean Energy, Recycling, Cars, Electricity Production

name: AQUAMOF TILAPIA CAMEROON
product_desc:
Our purpose is to Produce Tilapia with Intensive Aquaculture Fish Farm in Cameroon, Central Africa Region, sold in the country, and also export in neighboring countries.
Our goal in the first 3 years is to achieve a significant production of 3000 tons of fresh fish.

Imagine production of 10 000 tons of Tilapia fish annually, sold 1 526.7 € per ton?

Better yet, imagine a production of 5,000 tons of fish Tilapia, sold in neighboring countries such as Gabon 3,053 € - 3,817 € per ton?

Are this realistic?
Yes! And forecasts are even pessimistic!

This is Aquaculture. This is a Field of Agribusiness with high rent, and secure long-term profitability value of tomorrow, for who invest today.

To give you an idea, just think that Cameroon produces about 170,000 tons of fish per year (aquaculture is only about 1000 tons). To cover the deficit, the country imports about 180 000 tons, for more than 153 Million € per year, with a national demand estimated at 400 000 tons to date
company_type: Private Equity, Private Company, Private Limited

name: EasyTicket
product_desc:
EasyTicket is a web-based start-up platform that will serve travelers, travel agencies and hotels, by providing travelers real-time bus ticketing, management solutions to travel agencies and hotel reservation respectively.  EasyTicket is scheduled to commerce operation in June 2015. 

Currently, there are more than 20 travel agencies in Cameroon, with branches in multiple towns around the country. Traveling by bus is the major means of transport used in Cameroon, with over 97% of the population employing this means of transport according to our market research.

EasyTicket offers a solution to wipe out these inconsistencies by providing sophisticated up-to-date, affordable Management/Accounting Software Solutions to these travel agencies. This solution will allow them provide real-time booking/reservation service to travelers from anywhere online and receive SMS alerts notifying them on the booking and their bus departure time.

name: Will&Brothers
product_desc:
Dronefrica is a project with the objective to promote african culture, architectural beauty and local innovation trough  the power of images taken from drones. It’s the 1st full range of services for local Projects with drones in Cameroon. The idea is to not only sell but build services around the drones.It includes mapping,supporting local tourism,covering local events ,security ,entertainment.

With our mobile application we’ll encourage people to share AMAZING and VALORIZING pictures of their country. Dronefrica want to let the world see the real soul of the african continent. We want to let people see all the beautiful skills hidden in the continent that media never shows. That’s why we also created a youtube channel already online called Dronefrica TV. We’ll share video from drones coming from all Africa!

 By investing in Dronefrica Project,you decided to be part of a huge business opportunity and also support IT innovation by the next generation of youths african entrepreneurs.
markets: Governments, Tourism, Brand Marketing, Entertainment Industry

name: Lumin Labs
product_desc:
We create software products to help schools and businesses run more efficiently, and we're working hard to grow the tech industry in Cameroon.

Our first product is Schoolman 1.0 -- a student management system. It's a Chrome packaged app currently used by 8 high schools in North West Cameroon to manage student registration, accounting, and grading. Schoolman vastly improves the workflow of teachers and administrators and enables better analysis of student performance and gender equality.

LuminLabs grew out of a Peace Corps project and continues to operate across continents. We're adapting our product into a general purpose framework that facilitates offline-first application development with web technology. By working hand-in-hand with schools in the region, we ensure our software is perfectly tailored to their unique needs; we're fostering a growing community of teachers who understand software requirements design; and we're infusing greater confidence in the tech market.
markets: SaaS, Governments, K-12 Education, Non Profit

name: 1task1job
product_desc:
We help reduce youth unemployment in Cameroon and Africa by providing a market place that connects businesses/entrepreneurs and freelancers to enhance the country’s economy.

Our Target customers are hundreds of Small & Medium Sized companies, auto-entrepreneurs, and project holders in Cameroon and in its Diaspora (e.g. Nigeria, France, Germany, U.S, U.K). Also millions of SMEs and entrepreneurs in the world.

Our target beneficiaries are thousands of university students and unemployed youths, with specific competences and affordable labor costs, from around Cameroon

We want to help reduce youth unemployment in Africa which is currently 60% by providing this marketplace where youths will be able to subcontract microtasks from business and entrepreneurs all over the world
high_concept: Marketplace that connects worldwide businesses to freelancers
markets: Social Media, Social Commerce, Social Media Platforms

name: Jutap
product_desc:
Jutap lets you search data written in different languages using just a single language (the language you know). 

Standard search engines only allow you search english information using english search queries, french information using french queries, etc but with Jutap you can search information written in french using a query written in english.

With Jutap, a search is deeper than just the language you search in. You are opened to a wider set of information.

name: Mboppi
product_desc:
MBOPPI is like  the Central and Sub-Saharan Africa AMAZON (online shopping). www.mboppi.net

Customers can find products such as clothes, house furniture, online music, accessories and beauty .
We sell new and past season products (That are found abroad only (clothing, technology, luxury brands, electric household appliances)

We sell in Central Africa and in the long term Sub-Saharan and the whole Africa 
- the website can be rent by other retailers to sell their products.
- We propose a new way to shop to African consumers (We sell at discount or at the price) and customers pay on delivery at home by cash or online by card, or pay at the pick up point. Customers will have access to quality products locally, with an excellent customers services reducing their transport fees. "your shopping come to you"

WHO ARE THE CUSTOMERS - http://mboppi.net/businessmodel
Internet users with an average income less, equal to, or higher than $ 400/month in Cameroon and Africa
high_concept: Online shopping adapted for Central Africa

name: Easy Gallery
product_desc:
E-Gallery is an e-commerce website for local artists in Cameroon and Central Africa.
The central problem that E-Gallery addresses is the current lack of direct access for
local cameroonean artists to global markets and the lack of promotion of cameroonean culture to mainstream consumers.
E-Gallery will target to major markets: 
1. Consumers and wholesellers from USA, Belgium, Germany, UK, France, and Switzerland;
2. Centrer African corporations and philanthropists that are interested in promoting
local Cameroon culture. Advantages as the first e-commerce websites for Cameroonean artists are:  
• Direct access to first class Cameroon artisan products 
• Door to door delivery 
• Competitive pricing 
• Background information including videos on artists and local Cameroonean culture

name: Kiro'o Games
product_desc:
"Aurion legacy of the Kori-Odan" is an Action Role Playing Game (A-RPG) in 2D HD designed for personnal computer and console system.
Aurion is aim to highlight the beauty and exoticism of Africa through the African fantasy. The gameplay is inspired by the series "Tales of" and wants to be very dynamic and creative in a richly colored universe.
In game, you play as Enzo Kori-Odan, Prince of Zama. The day of your coronation and wedding with Erine Evou, you suffer a coup d’état orchestrated by your brother in law Ngarba Evou. Exiled, you go around the world with Erine looking for support. You must find your particular Aurionique Heritage to regain the throne.

Because there has never been an African A-RPG game on the gaming market, our target is the worldwide core-gamers. We innovate by bringing new blood to the gaming industry, a new story and experience!

The final version of Aurion will be on sale by April 2016 in digital download on STEAM.
Download the demo here: www.aurionthegame.com
markets: Social Games, Video Games, Mobile Games

name: COUARGE LTD SARL
product_desc: KIWII est la première alternative de paiement en ligne sans engagement pour les pays pauvres et les pays en voie de développement. Il contourne la limite du faible taux de bancarisation et de l'utilisation des cartes bancaires dans ces pays là pour offrir une solution de paiement en ligne accessible à toute personne disposant d'un téléphone portable. Au Cameroun cela représente 12 millions d'utilisateurs potentiels et 450 millions en Afrique Sub saharienne.KIWII  favorise le décollage de l'e-commerce dans les pays en voie de développement. Loin d'être un simple E-wullet, KIWII offre à ces utilisateurs un ensemble d'outil leur permettant de faire des opération allant au dela des achat en ligne comme le transfert d'argent. Au développeur KIWII offre des API leur permettant de l'accepter comme moyen de paiement sur leur site de commerce en ligne. Kiwii est le seul moyen de paiement d'avenir pour les pays émergents
high_concept: Payer en ligne avec son forfait mobile

We work together with these agencies to understand the tourism needs of our clients so as to get the fittest tourism agency who understands these needs and other related features like the pricing and time constraints of the customer, and we match the most appropriate local tourism agency to the right tourist.

name: Central African Capital Holdings
product_desc:
Central Africa Capital Holdings (CACH) a Central African private Equity Company that invests in entrepreneurs, builds successful small-to medium sized enterprises (SMEs) and delivers sustainable financial and social returns. We do this because we are passionate about entrepreneurs as the key drivers of job creation and long-term economic development in Africa.

A scalable business model
Our geographic footprint spans six markets: Cameroon, Chad,
Equatorial Guinea, Gabon, Central Africa republic, Congo-Brazzaville.

Country Coverage
The CACH business model is highly scalable – we have proven the concept 
in Cameroon and within just one year, replicated our model in Chad, the 
Congos, Gabon, Central African Republic and Equatorial Guinea.

Our funds allow us to significantly increase the scale and 
geographic reach of our operations, enabling us to build hundreds of 
successful businesses across Central Africa and deliver strong returns to 
our investors.

The problem PULSE solves is the inefficient communication channels used by over 90% African universities who rely solely on notice boards, in class announcements and mouth to mouth to communicate.

Live products

Individuals: Updates and alerts via email, job search from job boards across Africa available on www.njorku.com and professional profiling (mined from CVs)  enabling more relevant updates, alerts and searches.

Recruiters: Search CV bank for relevant job candidates, place and advertise job announcements on multiple job boards using Nukeboard (www.nukeboard.co) and cloud-based software (Nukeboard) to manage the recruitment process.
